original: nam mkha'i khams rgya chen por mi @311a *//🔽bgyid; rgya chung ngur mi bgyid do //
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams rgya chen por mi @311a *// bgyid; rgya chung ngur mi bgyid do //
translated: They do not make the space element vast or small.🔽They do not make the consciousness element vast or small.🔽They do not make ignorance vast or small.🔽They do not make volitional factors vast or small.

original: rnam par shes pa'i khams rgya chen por mi bgyid /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i khams rgya chen por mi bgyid /
translated: They do not make consciousness vast or small.🔽They do not make name and form vast or small.🔽They do not make the six sense fields vast or small.🔽They do not make contact vast or small.🔽They do not make feeling vast or small.🔽They do not make craving vast or small.🔽They do not make grasping vast or small.🔽They do not make becoming vast or small.🔽They do not make birth vast or small.🔽They do not make old age and death vast or small.🔽They do not make suffering vast or small.🔽They do not make the origin vast or small.🔽They do not make cessation vast or small.

original: rgya chung ngur mi bgyid do //🔽ma rig pa rgya chen por mi bgyid /
analyzed: rgya chung ngur mi bgyid do // ma rig pa rgya chen por mi bgyid /
translated: They do not make the path vast or small.🔽They do not make the knowledge of the thus-gone ones vast or small.

original: rgya chung ngur mi bgyid do //🔽'du byed rgya chen por mi bgyid /
analyzed: rgya chung ngur mi bgyid do // 'du byed rgya chen por mi bgyid /
translated: They do not make the thus-gone ones vast or small.🔽They do not make the Dharma vast or small.🔽They do not make the Saṅgha vast or small.🔽They do not make the perfection of generosity vast or small.🔽They do not make the perfection of discipline vast or small.🔽They do not make the perfection of patience vast or small.🔽They do not make the perfection of diligence vast or small.

original: rgya chung ngur mi bgyid do //
analyzed: rgya chung ngur mi bgyid do //
translated: They do not make the perfection of concentration vast or small.

original: rnam par shes pa rgya chen por mi bgyid /🔽rgya chung ngur mi bgyid do //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa rgya chen por mi bgyid / rgya chung ngur mi bgyid do //
translated: They do not make the perfection of wisdom vast or small.🔽They do not make the emptiness of internal phenomena vast or small.

original: ming dang gzugs rgya chen por mi bgyid; rgya chung ngur mi bgyid do //🔽skye mched drug rgya chen por mi bgyid /🔽rgya chung ngur mi bgyid do //
analyzed: ming dang gzugs rgya chen por mi bgyid; rgya chung ngur mi bgyid do // skye mched drug rgya chen por mi bgyid / rgya chung ngur mi bgyid do //
translated: They do not make the emptiness of external phenomena vast or small.🔽They do not make the emptiness of both internal and external phenomena vast or small.🔽They do not make the emptiness of emptiness vast or small.

original: reg pa rgya chen por mi bgyid /
analyzed: reg pa rgya chen por mi bgyid /
translated: They do not make the emptiness of great extent vast or small.🔽They do not make the emptiness of ultimate reality vast or small.🔽They do not make the emptiness of conditioned phenomena vast or small.🔽They do not make the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena vast or small.

original: rgya chung ngur mi bgyid do //
analyzed: rgya chung ngur mi bgyid do //
translated: They do not make the emptiness of the unlimited vast or small.🔽They do not make the emptiness of the absence of attributes vast or small.

analyzed: mthu ma mchis par mi bgyid do //

original: mthu ma mchis par mi bgyid do //
analyzed: mthu ma mchis par mi bgyid do //
translated: He does not make the emptiness meditative stabilization, signless meditative stabilization, or wishless meditative stabilization powerful or not powerful.🔽He does not make the five eyes powerful or not powerful.

original: mngon par shes pa rnams mthu dang ldan par mi bgyid; mthu ma mchis par mi bgyid do //🔽ting nge 'dzin rnams mthu dang ldan par mi bgyid /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams mthu dang ldan par mi bgyid; mthu ma mchis par mi bgyid do // ting nge 'dzin rnams mthu dang ldan par mi bgyid /
translated: He does not make the six clairvoyances powerful or not powerful.

original: mthu ma mchis par mi bgyid do //
analyzed: mthu ma mchis par mi bgyid do //
translated: He does not make the meditative stabilizations powerful or not powerful.

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams mthu dang ldan par mi bgyid /🔽mthu ma mchis par mi bgyid do //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams mthu dang ldan par mi bgyid / mthu ma mchis par mi bgyid do //

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu mthu dang ldan par mi bgyid / mthu ma mchis par mi bgyid do //

analyzed: mi 'jigs pa bzhi mthu dang ldan par mi bgyid; mthu ma mchis par mi bgyid do //

analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi mthu dang ldan par mi bgyid /🔽mthu ma mchis par mi bgyid do //
translated: He does not make the four detailed and thorough knowledges powerful or not powerful.🔽He does not make the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha powerful or not powerful.

original: snying rje chen po mthu dang ldan par mi bgyid; mthu ma mchis par mi bgyid do //🔽sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mthu dang ldan par mi bgyid /

analyzed: mthu ma mchis par mi bgyid do //

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so //🔽gang snying rje chen po che bar bgyid pa'am /🔽chung bar bgyid pa de ni /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so // gang snying rje chen po che bar bgyid pa'am / chung bar bgyid pa de ni /
translated: “To make great or small the four immeasurables is not a result that accords with the perfection of wisdom.🔽To make great or small the four formless absorptions is not a result that accords with the perfection of wisdom.🔽To make great or small the five clairvoyances is not a result that accords with the perfection of wisdom.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so //
translated: To make great or small the six superknowledges is not a result that accords with the perfection of wisdom.🔽To make great or small the thirty-seven dharmas on the side of awakening is not a result that accords with the perfection of wisdom.🔽To make great or small the three gateways to liberation is not a result that accords with the perfection of wisdom.🔽To make great or small the eight deliverances is not a result that accords with the perfection of wisdom.🔽To make great or small the nine serial absorptions is not a result that accords with the perfection of wisdom.🔽To make great or small the ten powers of the tathāgatas is not a result that accords with the perfection of wisdom.🔽To make great or small the four fearlessnesses is not a result that accords with the perfection of wisdom.🔽To make great or small the four detailed and thorough knowledges is not a result that accords with the perfection of wisdom.

original: gang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad che bar bgyid pa'am /🔽chung bar bgyid pa de ni /🔽shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so //
analyzed: gang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad che bar bgyid pa'am / chung bar bgyid pa de ni / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so //
translated: To make great or small the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha is not a result that accords with the perfection of wisdom.🔽To make great or small the result of stream enterer is not a result that accords with the perfection of wisdom.

original: gang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu che bar bgyid pa'am /🔽chung bar bgyid pa de ni /🔽shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so //
analyzed: gang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu che bar bgyid pa'am / chung bar bgyid pa de ni / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma lags so //
translated: To make great or small the result of once-returner is not a result that accords with the perfection of wisdom.🔽To make great or small the result of non-returner is not a result that accords with the perfection of wisdom.🔽To make great or small the state of a worthy one is not a result that accords with the perfection of wisdom.

original: gang lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu che bar bgyid pa'am /🔽chung bar bgyid pa de ni /

translated: To make great or small a pratyekabuddha’s awakening is not a result that accords with the perfection of wisdom.
